item.description:
This fall join the Boston Center for Adult Education and Masa Restaurant for "Latin Mondays," a night of Latin-inspired food and dance classes.

The temperature will start to rise at 6:00PM with "Salsa for Beginners," where students will learn the basics of the sensual style. At 8:00PM things heat up with "Latin Dance Basics," where students will learn various Latin styles.

After class, what better way to cool down than with a refreshing cocktail or tapas at Masa Restaurant? All students enrolled in the BCAE's "Latin Mondays" will receive 20% off of their bill on Monday nights at Masa Restaurant during the 6 week duration of the class. *Please Note: this does not include tax, gratuity of alcohol.

Visit www.bcae.org to sign up!
item.name: Latin Mondays
